sources.title: With Love and Kisses (1936) PINKY TOMLIN
sources.description:
Stars: Pinky Tomlin, Toby Wing, Kane Richmond 
Director: Les Goodwins

A country boy with a knack for songwriting falls victim to the music business when he sells a song to repay a loan.

metadata.Plot: A na√Øve farmer writing songs tries his chances in New York. Unlucky, he is helped by a crooner who lusts after one of his songs. Ignoring the real value of his composition, he sold it for the money he owed to his friends: $200.
metadata.Actors: Pinky Tomlin, Toby Wing, Kane Richmond
